mention.text: the minister designated to act on my behalf and with my closest assistants
mad actions carried out by criminals , who intend to control an entire people , government , and country through terror and destruction

the inclusion of the extradition issue in the referendum

the stable democracy we have built and defended with great effort for over 1 century
